channel.title: Posts on Cole Peterson's Sports Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cole Peterson's Sports Blog

item.title: Has Nikola Jokic done enough to earn back-to-back NBA MVP awards?
item.description: The MVP race in the NBA is the closest it’s ever been. In the recent weeks it has ultimately been narrowed down to three very polarizing candidates. Giannis Antetokounmpo, Joel Embiid and Nikola Jokic. Four players have been repeat winners of the NBA’s most prestige award over the last 13 years. The Joker looks to be the fifth, and perhaps the most impressive player analytically in recent memory. Lets take a look at how he’s getting it done.
